document_data.name: Olfgaut
document_data.mainbody: '''Olfgaut''' was a [[Northlander]] inhabiting the island of [[Norland]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}.{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|11}}
document_data.Activities:
Given that Olfgaut was already an old man in {{Yearlink|1479}}, he believed his son should be the next Jarl of Norland. However, the [[Storm Maiden]]'s recent rise to power hindered his plans since he knew she would soon challenge the Jarl of Norland to lead the Northlanders of the island. Olfgaut knew his son stood no chance against the Storm Maiden in combat, so he planned to have [[assassin]]s take her out the next time she visited [[Stormbanner Hold]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|11-12}}

Olfgaut was killed during the ensuing conflict with the Storm Maiden. Both he and his son were dead by the {{YearlinkName|1489}}.
document_data.Relationships: Olfgaut was the son of Jarl [[Rault|Rault the Wise]]. His own son was [[Olfsvenn]].
